text.description:
I went to the worst reviewed restaurant in Italy which is also the lowest rated restaurant in the history of our show to see what's wrong.
Get O2's e-sim with 10GB of mobile data in EU: https://od.o2.cz/PPPeter with first 10 people getting one day of unlimited data
Get your copy of All the Places I Didn't Die HERE: https://www.pppeter.shop/ or on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CKVXW4GB/ref=tsm_1_fb_lk
READ THE FIRST CHAPTER FOR FREE HERE: https://www.pppeter.shop/info/bookpreview
SUPPORT ME ON PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/PPPeter
MERCH: https://represent.com/store/pppeter
INSTAGRAM https://www.instagram.com/patopopular/
FACEBOOK https://www.facebook.com/PPPeterYouTube/
TWITTER https://twitter.com/peterblathering
text.fulltitle: Eating at the Worst Reviewed Restaurant in Italy
